message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm offering it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $120 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $70 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm offering the product to you for $100.
Alice, $100 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $75.  Let's see if we can close this deal.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $82.50
Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $82.50 is still a bit out of my range. I'm willing to go up to $80. Let's close this deal.
I'm not going to budge much more, Bob. I'll meet you at $82.50, but that's as low as I can go.
